This is an overview of learning material in the course [TMA4315 Generalized linear models](https://wiki.math.ntnu.no/tma4315) given at the [Department of Mathematical Sciences](https://www.ntnu.edu/imf) at [NTNU](https://www.ntnu.edu/) in the autumn of 2018. [Course description with formal information](https://www.ntnu.edu/studies/courses/TMA4315#tab=omEmnet).

# Module pages

These are links to (html-versions of) module pages in TMA4315 Generalized linear models in the autumn semester 2018 at NTNU. (To see .Rmd just replace .html with .Rmd).

1. [Introduction](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/1Intro.html) with [solutions](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M1solutions.pdf)
2. [Multiple linear regression](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/2MLR.html) with [solution w1](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M2w1solutions.html) and [w2](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M2w2solutions.html)
3. [Binary regression](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/3BinReg.html) with [solution w1](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M3w1solutions.html) and [w2](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M3w2solutions.html)
4. [Poisson and gamma regression](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/4PoissonGamma.html) with [solution w1](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M4w1solutions.html) and [w2](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M4w2solutions.html)
5. [GLM â€” common core](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/5GLM.html) with [solutions](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M5w1solutions.html)
6. [Categorical regression ](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/6Categorical.html) with [solutions](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M6w1solutions.html)
7. [Linear mixed models](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/7LMM.html) with [solution w1](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M7w1solutions.html) and [w2](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M7w2solutions.html)
8. [Generalized linear mixed models](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/8GLMM.html) with [solutions](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/M8w1solutions.html) 
9. [Summing up](https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4315/2018h/9Final.html)
